website_summaries.verdict: Many were highly appreciative of the shoe’s overall design and performance. The Salomon Sense Marin is packed with the necessary technologies needed for a better trail running experience. The shoe offers a good blend of comfort, durability, and lightweight protection.
pros: The majority of the purchasers mentioned that the shoe is very comfortable
The lightweight construction of the shoe received praise
As mentioned in some reviews, the open mesh upper material of the shoe was able to provide breathable coverage
A couple of users mentioned that they liked the quick and one-pull lacing system of the shoe
The Sensifit technology gained positive feedback from several runners because it offered a secure and more personalized fit
The shoe is reasonably-priced, according to purchasers
A few runners admired the rugged outsole of the shoe, which allowed them to efficiently run on the trail
cons: A few wearers say the Sense Marin is too rugged to transition from trail to road running
A user noticed some wear in the outsole after only a few miles of running

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased after getting them on the trail at how well ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit very well. I have a long and narrow foot and these shoes hugged my heel very well with no slipping, but still plenty of space in the toe box. I was very pleased after getting them on the trail at how well they protected me from feeling all the rocks through the sole with out being heavy and clunky. I will definitely be getting these shoes when I wear through my current pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bpierce

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! A little pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! A little pricey but worth it, because of the fit, performance and the ruggedness of Salomon. If you like a roomy toebox and great response, these are the shoes to try. Love the speedlaces as well, as they are easy to use and stay in place. Fab shoes.
customer_reviews.author: towanda

customer_reviews.title: OK but not as good as other Salomon models.
customer_reviews.text: I love Salomon Speedcross 4, XA Enduro, Sense Pro Max, etc. but these just don't feel as good as the other models. However, they are Salomon and I know they will last a long time and even if I don't run a lot of mileage in these, I will find a use for them.
customer_reviews.author: Spartan13

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are THE BEST! This is my second pair of Salomon's and ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are THE BEST! This is my second pair of Salomon's and truly they fit me great! Like walking on properly aligned clouds. I have flat somewhat narrow feet and these are saving my back. I go for long walks every day usually on pavement but these are also great hiking and scrambling!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Seems quite study and good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nicer color than i expected from the photo. Seems quite study and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: LivingAbroad

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the comfort, hate the laces! It took me awhile to figure out how to loosen the lace, but a great shoe nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kajan75

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I've ever run in
customer_reviews.text: They fit my feet perfectly. Too bad Salomon doesn't make this style any more. I love them
customer_reviews.author: Amjohnson

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Super comfy Seem like they will not last very long Love them now on long walks
customer_reviews.author: EmilyElizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love them! These are my second pair of Salomon ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a nurse and use these for work. I love them! These are my second pair of Salomon shoes.
customer_reviews.author: jade.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solomon makes great, reliable trail shoes. I never have any complaints about their products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have no doubt that i would have loved them if they had fit
customer_reviews.text: I have no doubt that i would have loved them if they had fit. I have other Salomons that I love !
customer_reviews.author: Gina Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable! Love the quicklaces
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my step cardio workouts! Very comfortable! Love the quicklaces!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine lover

customer_reviews.title: Great support across entire metatarsal and long arch area.
customer_reviews.text: Love the firm elastic support of entire throat. Protects vs twist and other injuries onrush surfaces. Great shock absorbing shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Green

customer_reviews.title: Non existent durability and appalling customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the fit and they gave fantastic support to the whole of my foot ... but they literally wore out in 4 weeks . At £80 a pair and having read previous reviews I expected them to be ‘fit for purpose’ ... unfortunately this is not the case. Salomon customer service aren’t interested and say that the 2 year warranty only applies to manufacturing issues/defects Do not buy !
customer_reviews.author: Fozz67

product_meta.title: SALOMON Women's Sense Marin W Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: If you want to leave asphalt behind and explore new horizons, the SENSE MARIN has been designed to travel long paths under the sun. Take your time, free your mind. Discover another way to run.
feature_bullets: 3D Stretch Air Mesh - Allows extreme breathability and ventilation.
Sensifit System - Works to cradle the foot by providing a precise and secure fit.
Endofit - Designed to hug the foot in exactly the right places.
Quick Lacing System - Provides a one-pull tightening system.
Lace Pocket - Allows the laces to be stowed away reducing the risk of snagging.
